example.text: Every leader in Washington, even [[user]], agrees that we can’t default on our nation’s obligations—except [[user]]. He and his extreme caucus are still pushing for a default that will cause a recession and could cost working families their life savings. Shameful. [[url]]

Illinois has seen at least 272 HazMat incidents involving trains in just the last 10 years. What happened in East Palestine could just as easily have happened in our state, so I was proud to support [[user]]'s bipartisan bill and hope the full Senate passes it swiftly. [[url]]
